summary: Two guys from Kann journey to Sylt to fulfill their dream of becoming a lifguard.
cast: Michael Herbig|Hilmi Sözer|Dorkas Kiefer|Patricia Thielemann|Franz Tscherne|Hanno Pöschl|Alexander Baldé|Heinrich Giskes|Uli Krohm|Marc Richter|Frank-Leo Schröder|Hans Martin Stier|Torsten Voges|Martin Walz|Özgür Özata
title: Die Bademeister - Weiber, saufen, Leben retten
